content: ending with a ws row divider row knit 4 row slipping markers as you work stripe 2 checkerboard by lynn - 18 row row 1 rs k6 sm * k6 p6 repeat from * to last 6 sts sm k6 row 2 ws k6 sm * k6 p6 repeat from * to last 6 sts sm k6 row 3-6 repeat row 1 & 2 twice more row 7 rs k6 sm * p6 k6 repeat from * to last 6 sts sm k6 row 8 ws k6 sm * p6 k6 repeat from * to last 6 sts sm k6 row 9-12 repeat row 7 & 8 twice more row 13 rs k6 sm * k6 p6 repeat from * to last 6 sts sm k6 row 14 ws k6 sm * k6 p6 repeat from * to last 6 sts sm k6 row 15 18 repeat row 13 & 14 twice more total length will be 18 row worked ending with a ws row divider row knit 4 row slipping markers as you work stripe 3 diagonal texture by cindy 18 row row 1 rs k6 sm * k1 p1 repeat from * to last 6 sts sm k6 row 2 ws k6 sm * k1 p1 repeat from * to last 6 sts sm k6 row 3 k6 sm * p1 k3 repeat from * to last 6 sts sm k6 row 4 k6 sm * p3 k1 repeat from * to last 6 sts sm k6 row 5 k6 sm * k1 p1 repeat from * to last 6 sts sm k6 row 6 k6 sm * k1 p1 repeat from * to last 6 sts sm k6 row 7 k6 sm k2 * p1 k3 repeat from * to last 8 sts p1 k1 sm k6 row 8 k6 sm p1 * k1 p3 repeat from * to last 9 sts k1 p2 sm k6 repeat row 1-8 once more then row 1 & 2 for a total of 18 row worked ending with a ws row divider row knit 4 row slipping markers as you work stripe 4 diamonds by eileen - 20 row row 1 k6 sm knit to last 6 sts sm k6 row 2 k6 sm purl to last 6 sts sm k6 abbreviations k = knit p = purl st s = stitch es pm = place marker sm = slip marker rs = right side ws = wrong side tbl = through the back loop k2tog = knit 2 sts together p2tog = purl 2 sts together st s = stitch es kfb = knit into the front and the back of the stitch to make an increase p l y m o u t h y a r n® f989 free pattern with our compliments find inspiration www plymouthyarn com page 4 row 3 rs k6 sm k3 * k4 p3 k3 repeat from * to last 9 sts k3 sm k6 row 4 ws k6 sm p3 *
